purpose: To present a predictive model for determining next best spend category and merchant to increase spend.
title: Case Study: Predicting Next Best Spend Category and Merchant to Increase Spend

bullets.text: Large bank in LAC is looking to implement innovative modeling approaches to generate category expansion offers
How can we predict what next industry or merchant each category is going to spend in and customize marketing offers to incentivize higher levels of spend?
Using MC Transactional Data, analyze current spend patterns for all existing client products
Develop a Market Basket Analysis (MBA) model to detect relationships in transactional data and predict expansion into next category
Develop campaign recommendations and calculate potential incremental spend lift from each campaign

reasoning_strategy: Utilize data analysis and predictive modeling to offer targeted marketing solutions.

visual_elements.label: Custom Market Basket Analysis model predicts next spend category for each account
Incremental spend lift from category expansion campaigns
